string.text: Choose to which party the training will be apply to.
(Default 3) The higher this is, the more impact leadership will have on training.
(Default 10) The higher this is, the more impact level difference will have on training.
(Default 3) The higher this is, the more impact leadership will have on training for the player party.
(Default 10) The higher this is, the more impact level difference will have on training for the player party.
Total training XP for the day:
